Mending A Broken Heart Mending A Broken Heart

Love is all about sharing and caring. It is sweet when things go on smoothly. But the reverse is the case when your loved one dis- appoints you. You can get over that broken heartthat you think you will die of by follow- ing these simple tips, says an expert. XE Love is all about sharing and caring. It is sweet when things go on smoothly. But the reverse is the case when your loved one dis- appoints you. You can get over that broken heartthat you think you will die of by follow- ing these simple tips, says an expert. XE

A broken marriage or love affair can make you feel depressed, angry and unloved. But you can get through a break up, says a psychologist. You should remember that time is your best friend. Look ahead. Make plans for the future. Map out your next holiday or some activities. Imagine yourself in the future, smiling, feeling self-assured and happy. Remember that image and carry it through the hard times. A broken marriage or love affair can make you feel depressed, angry and unloved. But you can get through a break up, says a psychologist. You should remember that time is your best friend. Look ahead. Make plans for the future. Map out your next holiday or some activities. Imagine yourself in the future, smiling, feeling self-assured and happy. Remember that image and carry it through the hard times.

HEALTH HEALTH
Teenage Pregnancy Teenage Pregnancy

Each year, over 15 million women be- tween the ages of 15 and 20 give birth world wide, estimates a world wide magazine. This figure docs not include girls younger than 15, nor does it account for abortions or mis- carriages. In Africa alone about 28 per cent of all women give birth before they are 18 years of age. Researchers say that among the reasons for increasing teenage pregnancy in Africa are Ignorance about sexual matters, early marriages, and economic hardship that tempts young women to enter "sugar daddy" relationship with older, wealthy men. "Not only do teenage women face, 'on average, twice the risk of dying in pregnancy or childbirth than women 20-34 years old", reports the magazine, but the Infants of teen mothers are likely to die, too." mother Awake Each year, over 15 million women be- tween the ages of 15 and 20 give birth world wide, estimates a world wide magazine. Cold Water As Therapy Cold Water As Therapy

FL Recent research by a Research Institute has led to the discovery of a new medical etreatment - Thermo Regulatory Hydro e Therapy - or, to put it more succinctly, regu- T lar cold baths. FL Recent research by a Research Institute has led to the discovery of a new medical etreatment - Thermo Regulatory Hydro e Therapy - or, to put it more succinctly, regu- T lar cold baths.

The research has found that cold water therapy increases the level of the body's natural thinning enzyme, improves circulation, stimu- lates testosterone production in men and boosts estrogen in women. "It is not a cure for every- thing," says an expert. "But it is a way to make our bodies perform better, to improve blood circulation on and to stimulate the immune system." So itseems those cold water fanatics aren't crazy at all. Stretching Your Body Stretching Your Body

Do you consider stretching a chore? Don't you know you should stretch after your work- outs? But if you just can't get yourself to do a complete stretch routine, you can do this with a partner. Do you consider stretching a chore? Don't you know you should stretch after your work- outs? But if you just can't get yourself to do a complete stretch routine, you can do this with a partner.

Proper stretching decreases your risk of injury. When you work out or play it can increase your range of motion and with a greater range of motion, you are less likely to pull a muscle. If you are too flexible, however, you are at increased risk of injury. Proper stretching decreases your risk of injury. Diary: Of A Care Free Single Gir A Young Lady Takes Peter Hosta Diary: Of A Care Free Single Gir A Young Lady Takes Peter Hosta

"Go sit down, I go see you later abi you go drink something?" As Peter requested for a small bottle of Guiness Stoutfor her, she said she wanted some chicken as well. Peter did not know what to say. He again ordered chicken. "Go sit down, I go see you later abi you go drink something?" As Peter requested for a small bottle of Guiness Stoutfor her, she said she wanted some chicken as well. Peter did not know what to say. He again ordered chicken.
"You mean say I tell you say make you come see me" Peter asked again. "You mean say I tell you say make you come see me" Peter asked again.

"Yes now, you gave me a lift around Jabita Hotel at Ikeja and told me to check you, I told you on that day that I was coming and that my name is Nkechi", the seductively dressed lady told Peter. "So wetin you wan make I do for you now", Peter asked. I kept to myself trying to figure out what will happen. Afterall it is not my business, even if the lady embarrasses Peter. But the lady was a bit nervous, while I stared into her eyes intimidatingly. I wondered why some ladies are just too daring when they see wealthy men. But the lady was a bit nervous, while I stared into her eyes intimidatingly. I wondered why some ladies are just too daring when they see wealthy men.

The young lady ate the food with style, picking the chicken parts stylishly as if she did not want to soil her hands. Other ladies stared at us, they expected that was going to quarrel with this lady called Nkechi. I pretended as if I was not bothered, but deep in my mind, I was quite jealous; I was proud to have good-looking and rich Peter beside me. And music started blaring from the invisible loud speakers.
